original_text: Barnabas arrived in Antioch. He saw how God had been kind to the people there and helped them. Barnabas was happy about this. So he said to the new believers, ‘Continue to trust the Lord Jesus completely.’
korean_text: 그가 이르러 하나님의 은혜를 보고 기뻐하여 모든 사람에게 굳건한 마음으로 주와 함께 머물러 있으라 권하니

sentences.original_text: He saw how God had been kind to the people there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 그곳 사람들에게 친절하셨음을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: So he said to the new believers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 새로운 믿는 자들에게 말했습니다,

sentences.original_text: Continue to trust the Lord Jesus completely.
